wikipedia_page.main: Robert Grant VC (1837 – 23 November 1874) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Robert Grant VC, soldier and police constable
*Sergeant Robert Grant 5th Regiment of Foot (Indian Rebellion)

link_mentions.page: List of English Victoria Cross recipients
response: |Robert Grant || British Army || 1857 || Indian Mutiny || Alambagh
Robert Grant is the name of:
*Robert Grant (British Columbia politician) (1854–1935), lumberman and politician in British Columbia, Canada
*Sir Robert Grant (MP) (1779–1838), British politician and lawyer, hymn-writer and essayist
*Ramesvara Swami, born Robert Grant, ISKCON member
*Robert Grant (novelist) (1852–1940), American novelist and Boston judge
